summary.span: 表示工作流运行时引擎为工作流提供的可配置执行环境。

span.span: Represents the configurable execution environment provided by the workflow run-time engine for workflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 公开主机应用程序和服务所需的功能来配置和控制工作流运行时引擎，并接收工作流运行时引擎及其任何工作流实例发生更改的通知。 exposes functionality required by a host application and services to configure and control the workflow run-time engine and to be notified of changes to both the workflow run-time engine and any of its workflow instances. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流宿主中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 该代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数和 、 和 方法。It provides examples of how to use the constructor and the , , and methods. 该代码还给出了建议采用的方法，即如何使用 方法在工作流主机中创建 对象。The code also shows the recommended way to create a object in a workflow host using the method. 它还演示如何为 、 和 事件设置事件处理程序。It also shows how to set event handlers for the , , and events. 此代码示例是[取消工作流](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以默认属性值进行初始化的，包含默认的核心服务。The is initialized with the default property values and contains the default core services. 若要另外配置工作流运行时引擎，可以通过使用 和 来添加和移除服务，还可以设置 。To additionally configure the workflow run-time engine, you can add and remove services by using and , and you can set . 配置 后，调用 以启动工作流运行时引擎及其服务。After the is configured, call to start the workflow run-time engine and its services. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of class. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"WorkflowRuntime""WorkflowRuntime"| ||`false`| 默认核心服务是 和 。The default core services are and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流主机中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how you can use functionality from a workflow host. 它提供了有关如何使用 构造函数来创建 实例并访问其方法和事件的示例。It provides an example of how to use the constructor to create an instance of a and access its methods and events. 此代码示例是[取消工作流](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据应用程序配置文件中的 所指定节中的设置初始化的 `configSectionName`。The is initialized according to the settings in the section specified by `configSectionName` in the application configuration file. `configSectionName` 必须与配置文件的有效 `workflowSettings` 部分对应。`configSectionName` must correspond to a valid `workflowSettings` section of a configuration file. 当通过使用应用程序配置文件来配置工作流运行时引擎时，它将加载并实例化配置文件的 `Services` 节中列出的类型的类。When the workflow run-time engine is configured by using an application configuration file, it loads and instantiates classes of the types listed in the `Services` section of the configuration file. 工作流运行时引擎构造这些类时，将按以下顺序查找使用以下签名的类构造函数：When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order: 1. Service(WorkflowRuntime 运行时,NameValueCollection 参数)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters) 2. Service(WorkflowRuntime 运行时)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime) 3. Service(NameValueCollection 参数)Service(NameValueCollection parameters) 4. Service()Service() 从配置文件加载的所有服务类至少必须实现这些构造函数签名之一。All service classes that are loaded from a configuration file must implement at least one of these constructor signatures. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数提供了一个机制，可对不使用应用程序配置文件的宿主使用单一方法调用来配置工作流运行时引擎。This constructor provides a mechanism to configure the workflow run-time engine using a single method call for hosts that do not use an application configuration file. 不使用应用程序配置文件的原因很多。There are many reasons for not using the application configuration file. 宿主可以在不允许使用配置文件的环境中运行，例如在受信任环境中由于安全原因不允许从应用程序配置文件读取数据。A host can run in an environment that does not allow using configuration files; for example, in trusted environments that do not allow reading from the application configuration file for security reasons. 此外，宿主可以使用专有的配置机制；例如，宿主可以将工作流运行时引擎的配置设置存储在 SQL 数据库中。Also, a host can use a proprietary configuration mechanism; for example, the host can store the workflow run-time engine configuration settings in a SQL database. 工作流运行时引擎将会加载 中所含类型的类并将其实例化。The workflow run-time engine loads and instantiates classes of the types contained in . 工作流运行时引擎构造这些类时，将按以下顺序查找使用以下签名的类构造函数：When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order: 1. Service(WorkflowRuntime 运行时,NameValueCollection 参数)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters) 2. Service(WorkflowRuntime 运行时)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime) 3. Service(NameValueCollection 参数)Service(NameValueCollection parameters) 4. Service()Service() `settings` 中指定的所有服务类至少必须实现这些构造函数签名之一。All service classes that are specified in `settings` must implement at least one of these constructor signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过添加核心服务可以配置工作流运行时引擎。You can configure the workflow run-time engine by adding core services. 核心服务是派生自以下任一服务基类的服务： 类、 类、 类和 类。Core services are those that derive from any of the following service base classes: the class, the class, the class, and the class. 仅当工作流运行时引擎未运行时，才能添加核心服务;也就是说，当 `false` 时。Core services can only be added when the workflow run-time engine is not running; that is, when is `false`. 也可以用作存储其他服务的容器，其他工作流或宿主上运行的应用程序可能会使用这些服务。The can also be used as a storage container for other services that can be used by other workflows or by applications running on a host. 如果您在工作流运行时引擎启动后添加派生自 类的非核心服务，则 将会调用该服务实现的 方法。If you add a non-core service that derives from the class after the workflow run-time engine has been started, calls the method implemented by that service. > [!NOTE] > 有一些限制，即不能将同一 的两个服务添加到 。 enforces the restriction that no two services of the same can be added to the . 但是，您可以添加派生自相同基类的多个服务。However, you can add multiple services that derive from the same base class. 从 中的以下每个服务基类只能派生一个服务： 类、 类和 类。There can be only one service derived from each of the following service base classes in the : the class, the class, and the class. 如果您添加了派生自其中一个类的多个服务（例如两个持久性服务），则 将引发 。If you add multiple services derived from one of these classes, for example two persistence services, throws an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流宿主中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 它提供了有关如何使用 方法向工作流运行时引擎添加 和 的示例。It provides example of how to use the method to add an and to the workflow run-time engine. 此代码示例是[取消工作流](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Cancelling a Workflow](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 之前，会对其执行验证。Before the is created, validation is executed on it. 如果出现任何验证错误，则会引发 。If any validation errors occur, the is thrown. 这对简单的方案很有用，但在服务器环境中，在每次激活时重新验证工作流可能会增加不必要的系统开销。This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead. 有关禁用验证的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about disabling validation, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法在工作流主机中创建 对象。The following code example demonstrates the recommended way to create a object in a workflow host using the method. 此代码示例是[取消工作流](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 之前，会对其执行验证。Before the is created, validation is executed on it. 如果出现任何验证错误，则会引发 。If any validation errors occur, the is thrown. 这对简单的方案很有用，但在服务器环境中，在每次激活时重新验证工作流可能会增加不必要的系统开销。This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead. 有关禁用验证的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about disabling validation, see . 由 `instanceId` 加载的任何运行工作流的工作流 必须具有唯一性。The workflow `instanceId` for any running workflows loaded by the must be unique. 如果您要传递一个 `instanceId` 来创建工作流，而某个运行中的工作流已在使用该 `instanceId`，将会引发 。If you pass an `instanceId` to create a workflow and a running workflow is already using that `instanceId`, an is thrown. 有关将参数传递到 `CreateWorkflow`的示例，请参阅[带参数的工作流示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157403)。For an example of passing in parameters to `CreateWorkflow`, see [Workflow with Parameters Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157403). 有关使用 XML 中定义的规则的示例，请参阅[IfElse With Rules 示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157404)。For an example of using rules defined in XML, see [IfElse with Rules Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157404).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要正常关闭 ，应仅在调用 之后才调用 。To shut down the gracefully, you should only call after you have called . 这是因为单独调用 方法会使 处于不可用状态。This is because calling the method alone leaves the in an unusable state. 通过关闭文件句柄、数据库连接等来释放运行时占用的资源，但它不会卸载工作流实例、停止服务或执行 所执行的任何其他操作。 frees the resources used by the runtime by closing open file handles, database connections, and so on, but it does not unload workflow instances, stop services, or do any of the other actions that does. 只有当宿主应用程序必须在垃圾收集器自动释放 使用的资源前释放这些资源时，才应调用 。 should be called only when the host application must free the resources used by the before they are automatically freed by the garbage collector. 有关 的常规信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For general information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对 对象调用 。The following example demonstrates how to call on a object. 在此示例中，将会针对应用程序的主窗体从 FormClosing 事件处理程序中调用 方法；这可确保在应用程序关闭时正确清理运行时创建的对象。In this sample, the method is called from the FormClosing event handler for the main form of the application; this ensures that the objects created by the runtime are properly cleaned up when the application shuts down. 此示例来自[语音应用程序示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405)。This sample is from the [Speech Application Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `instanceId` 指定的工作流实例当前不在内存中，则会将该工作流实例加载到内存并计划执行。If `instanceId` specifies a workflow instance that is not currently in memory, the workflow instance is loaded into memory and scheduled for execution. 例如，某个工作流实例被中止后，您可以调用 以将该工作流实例重新加载回内存。For example, after a workflow instance is aborted, you can call to load the workflow instance back into memory. 在这种情况下，持久性服务会将工作流实例的上一个保留状态加载到内存。In this case, the last persisted state of the workflow instance is loaded into memory by the persistence service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 `ReloadWorkflow`方法如何调用 {3} 方法。The following code example demonstrates a `ReloadWorkflow` method that calls the method. `ReloadWorkflow` 方法是一个更大类的一部分，该大类具有的 `Runtime` 属性可访问 类的所有方法、属性和事件。The `ReloadWorkflow` method is part of a larger class that has a `Runtime` property to access all of the methods, properties, and events of the class. 此代码示例是[自定义持久性服务示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351) sample. > [!NOTE] > 在该示例中，调用 是多余的，因为 和 两种方法都使用相同的内部帮助器方法将工作流实例加载到内存中。In the example, the call to is redundant because both the and methods use the same internal helper method to load the workflow instance into memory. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServicesExceptionNotHandled As EventHandler(Of ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs)
Public Event ServicesExceptionNotHandled As EventHandler(Of ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs)

summary.span: 在派生自 类的服务调用 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a service that is derived from the class calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的服务可调用 方法，以通知 事件的订户在执行过程中出现无法处理的异常。A service that is derived from the class can call the method to inform subscribers to the event that an exception that it was unable to handle occurred during its execution. 您可以订阅此事件以实现恢复机制。You can subscribe to this event to implement a recovery mechanism. 在工作流运行时引擎尚未创建工作流实例前引发此事件，同时将出现一个异常。This event is raised when a workflow instance has not been created yet by the workflow run-time engine and an exception occurs. 在此方案中，通知主机应用程序发生异常的唯一方法是引发此事件。In this scenario, the only way to inform a host application that an exception occurred is to raise this event. 但是，工作流运行时引擎不直接调用此方法。However, the workflow run-time engine does not call this directly. 工作流运行时引擎而是向工作流实例发送异常，或者在没有实例的情况下将异常引发回调用方（本例中调用方实际上是激发此事件的服务）。Instead, the workflow run-time engine either delivers an exception to the workflow instance or, if there is no instance, throws back to the caller, which in this case is actually the service that fires this event. 如果要创建自己的持久性服务或计划程序，您必须自己使用 基方法来实现此事件。If you create your own persistence or scheduler service, you must implement this event yourself through the base method. 对于 事件，发送方包含 ，而 包含使用服务的工作流实例的 ，以及无法处理的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the of the workflow instance that was using the service and the that could not be handled. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流宿主中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 该代码将 与一个事件处理程序（即一个名为 `OnExceptionNotHandled` 的方法）相关联。The code associates with an event handler, a method named `OnExceptionNotHandled`. 此代码示例是[自定义持久性服务示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351)的一部分。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#271](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#271)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#271](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#271)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Started As EventHandler(Of WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs)
Public Event Started As EventHandler(Of WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs)

summary.span: 启动工作流运行时引擎时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在验证了工作流运行时引擎的核心服务配置后引发了 事件，已调用了从 类派生的每个服务实现的 方法，并已将 设置为 `true`。The method raises the event after it has validated the core service configuration of the workflow run-time engine, has invoked the method implemented by each of its services that derive from the class, and has set to `true`. 工作流运行时引擎并不按照固定顺序启动派生自 类的服务，一部分工作流运行时引擎服务可能需要依赖另一部分服务所提供的功能来完成其启动任务。There is no guarantee about the order in which the services that derive from the class are started by the workflow run-time engine, and some of these workflow run-time engine services may depend on functionality supplied by other of these services to complete their startup tasks. 引发 事件后，工作流运行时引擎服务可以重写 方法，以执行需要其他工作流运行时引擎服务支持的任何最终启动任务。Workflow run-time engine services can override the method to perform any final startup tasks that require the support of other workflow run-time engine services when the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将向 的 事件添加一个事件处理程序。In the following example, an event handler is added to the event of the . 在此示例中，处理程序是向控制台输出简单消息的匿名方法。In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console. [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets.cs#15)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets.vb#15)]

summary.span: 启动工作流运行时引擎和工作流运行时引擎服务。

span.span: Starts the workflow run-time engine and the workflow run-time engine services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证是否存在有效的核心服务集，然后启动派生自 类的任何服务。This method verifies that a valid set of core services exists and then starts any services that derive from the class. 以下核心服务中必须有且仅有一个：派生自 基类的工作流 `CommitWorkBatch` 服务，以及派生自 基类的计划程序服务。There must be one and only one of each of the following core services: a workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service derived from the base class and a scheduler service derived from the base class. 如果缺少其中一个或两个核心服务，则工作流运行时引擎将为计划程序服务的工作流 `CommitWorkBatch` 服务和 提供相应的默认服务： 。If either or both of these core services are missing, the workflow run-time engine supplies the appropriate default service: for the workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service and for the scheduler service. 持久性服务为可选服务，但最多只能有一个持久性服务。A persistence service is optional, but there can be at most only one persistence service present. 验证服务配置后，将对派生自 类的所有服务调用 。After it has validated the service configuration, calls on all of the services that are derived from the class. 最后，工作流运行时引擎将设置 并引发 事件。Finally, the workflow run-time engine sets and raises the event. 在工作流运行时引擎启动后，您不能添加或移除核心服务。You cannot add or remove core services after the workflow run-time engine is started. 核心服务是派生自 类、 类、 类或 类的服务。Core services are services that derive from the class, the class, the class, or the class. 如果您在工作流运行时引擎运行过程中调用 ，将不会执行任何操作。If you call while the workflow run-time engine is running, no action is performed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流宿主中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 在 创建了 实例并在调用了 来向运行时添加服务后，代码将调用 。The code calls the after the creates a instance and after it calls to add services to the runtime. 在进行其他任何处理之前，它还会调用 。It also calls before any other processing occurs. 此代码示例是[取消工作流](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)示例的一部分。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample. summary.span: 工作流运行时引擎停止后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workflow run-time engine is stopped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在调用 方法后引发 事件，所调用的方法由它派生自 类的每个服务实现。The method raises the event after it has invoked the method implemented by each of its services that derive from the class. 停止这些工作流运行时引擎服务的顺序并不固定，其中一些服务可能需要保留其他服务所依赖的一些功能，直到也停止这些服务。There is no guarantee about the order in which these workflow run-time engine services are stopped, and some of these services may need to preserve some functionality that is relied on by other services until they too are stopped. 引发 事件后，此类服务可重写 方法，以执行任何剩余的关闭逻辑。Such services can override the method to perform any residual shutdown logic when the event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，将向 的 事件添加一个事件处理程序。In the following example, an event handler is added to the event of the . 在此示例中，处理程序是向控制台输出简单消息的匿名方法。In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console. summary.span: 在保留工作流的状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of a workflow instance is persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 保留工作流状态的原因可能很多。The workflow instance can be persisted for many reasons. 例如，宿主可能对工作流实例调用 ，或工作流运行时引擎可能由于实例变为空闲状态或完成原子作用域而保留工作流实例。For example, the host can call on a workflow instance, or the workflow run-time engine can persist a workflow instance because the instance is idle or because an atomic scope has completed. 如果 中存在持久性服务，则在将工作流实例的状态保存到内存后，运行时会引发 。If a persistence service is present in the , is raised by the runtime after the state of the workflow instance is saved to memory. 如果不存在持久性服务，将仍然会引发该事件，但不会保存实例状态。If a persistence service is not present, the event is still raised but the instance state is not saved. 如果 事件由于正在卸载工作流实例而发生，则 事件将紧随其后发生。If the event occurs because the workflow instance is being unloaded, it is followed by a event. 对于 事件，发送方包含 ，而 包含与事件关联的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流主机中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how you can use functionality from a workflow host. 该代码将 与一个事件处理程序即一个名为 `OnWorkflowPersisted` 的方法相关联。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowPersisted`. 此代码示例是[自定义持久性服务示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735)的一部分。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735). span.span: Occurs when execution of a workflow instance is resumed following a suspension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流运行时引擎恰好在计划工作流实例之前引发 事件。The workflow run-time engine raises the event just before the workflow instance is scheduled. 事件通常是由于对 的显式调用而引发的。The event is usually raised because of an explicit call to . 但是，工作流运行时引擎可能会暂时挂起实例以执行操作，例如，应用工作流更改。However, the workflow run-time engine can temporarily suspend an instance to perform an operation, for example, to apply a workflow change. 在这种情况下，当运行时引擎在该操作后恢复执行工作流实例时将引发 事件。In this case, the event is raised when the runtime resumes execution of the workflow instance following the operation. 对于 事件，发送方包含 ，而 包含与事件关联的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流主机中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how you can use functionality from a workflow host. 该代码将 与一个事件处理程序即一个名为 `OnWorkflowResume` 的方法相关联。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowResume`. 此代码示例是[挂起和终止示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157402)的一部分。This code example is part of the [Suspend and Terminate Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157402). summary.span: 从内存卸载工作流实例时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workflow instance is unloaded from memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过显式调用 从内存卸载工作流实例，也可以由工作流运行时引擎根据自身的语义来隐式卸载工作流实例。A workflow instance can be unloaded from memory by an explicit call to , or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine according to its own semantics. 例如，工作流运行时引擎将在实例进入空闲状态时卸载工作流实例，并为其 `true` 添加了运行时 。For example, the workflow run-time engine unloads a workflow instance if the instance becomes idle and the runtime has a added for which is `true`. 工作流运行时引擎在工作流实例的状态成功保存后，但在内存中的实例失效之前，将引发 `WorkflowUnloaded` 事件。The workflow run-time engine raises the `WorkflowUnloaded` event after the state of the workflow instance has been successfully persisted but before the instance is invalidated in memory. 因此， 事件将在 事件之前发生。Therefore, a event precedes the event. 对于 `WorkflowUnloaded` 事件，发送方包含 ，而 包含与事件关联的 。For the `WorkflowUnloaded` event, the sender contains the and contains the associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and raising events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用工作流宿主中的 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 该代码将 与一个事件处理程序即一个名为 `OnWorkflowUnload` 的方法相关联。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowUnload`. 此代码示例是[自定义持久性服务示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351)的一部分。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351).
